Evaluate overall response rate ( ORR ) combination romidepsin volasertib patient relapsed/refractory peripheral T cell cutaneous cell lymphoma . 2 . Define gene expression signature pattern acquire tumor mutation dynamically correlate clinical response romidepsin/volasertib combination therapy cutaneous T cell lymphoma ( CTCL ) longitudinal RNA sequence tumor sample .
